name: Divine Duel
abstract: Divine Duel is a VR fighting game that mixes Sci-Fi and Fantasy themes with crazy weaponry. Step inside the arena and defeat your rivals using a combination of over 40 weapons, spells, and summons.

detail.app_release_note:
Divine Duel Update v1.0.961
- Introducing new currency (Divine Points) used to purchase basic cosmetics and Celestial packs
- Divine Points are available in the store and can be earned through completing weekly tasks and achievements, leveling up, participating in events, progressing through the Battle Pass levels and receiving end-of-season rewards
- Gems are now exclusively available in the store and can be used to purchase advanced cosmetics and the premium Battle Pass
- Shop: Added Season 1 Battle Pass items
- Shop: Celestial base price changed from 1800 gems to 7000 DP (approx 30% reduction)
- Ushabti: Does not skip attack if a player is out of sword range
- Sureshot Bow: Fixed flying out from under the ground
- Bot improvements
- QoL improvements
- Minor bug fixes
detail.app_supported_platforms: PICO 4 Pro, PICO 4, PICO Neo3 Link, PICO Neo3 Pro
